recommendations: Yatin Agarwal â€œAshwary is a driven and highly committed individual. He grasps complex concepts quickly, internalizes them easily, and is not afraid to sensibly tweak product offerings to suit the requirements of the client. In a short time, he has built excellent relationships with colleagues, clients, and potential clients, which have given him the springboard to grow business and convert some difficult accounts. He is systematic with his work tasks and brings to the table his own style of sales, which have impressed colleagues and clients alike. It has been a pleasure working with him.â€

Melroy O'Connor â€œAshwary reported to me during his internship with Rupifi. He is a person who is always open to challenges thrown at him.
